title: players who verbally abuse their team lose 16% more games..
body:
since we are just making stuff up, why not just.. oh wait, Riot always does stuff that does not make any sense, nor by balance or Lore.

I see flames every day, Hell I blame my team for a reason, if you are stupid you need to be told, because in real life there are many stupid people, the problem is that stupid people don't know they are stupid, now here's a fact unlike the made up stuff above.

I still win matches, so.. how about "please try not to be a dick, there are plenty of that in League", sounds better to me.
